summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6506, for the improvement of NORTHEAST 103rd Street from approximately 250 feet west of 20th Avenue Northeast to 20th Avenue Northeast; by construction of a stabilize and seal coat improvement and such other work as may be necessary in connection therewith; under Ordinance No. 100286, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
